document_data.name: Temple of Howling Hatred
document_data.occupants: Members of the [[Cult of the Howling Hatred|Howling Hatred]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Howling Hatred''' was an underground temple-complex established by the [[Cult of the Howling Hatred]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was built within a quarter of [[Tyar-Besil]], a ruined [[dwarven]] city that once served as the capital of ancient [[Besilmer]].
document_data.Location: It was situated in the southwest section of the ruined city, within a vast cavern deep beneath the [[Sumber Hills]] in the [[Dessarin Valley]]. It was accessible by means of a precarious, miles-long staircase that descended deep beneath the hills' Knifepoint Gully.

Interior.Temple of Elemental Air:
Within the plaza was the pyramidal structure referred to by the cult members as the Temple of Elemental Air. Within the ground hall on the bottom floor was a deep pit of an unusual nature. A howling gust of wind continuously roared through the pit, lifting anyone or anything high above, to the [[Howling Caves]].

The second floor of the temple held the throne room of [[Torhild Flametongue]], the former King of  Besilmer. In front of a grand throne was a large engraved map that detailed the entire dwarven kingdom. The chamber was appropriated as her own by [[Aerisi Kalinoth]], the fakeâ€“[[avariel]] prophet of the Howling Hatred.

document_data.Activities: The Howling Hatred cultists used the temple as their headquarters, from which they abducted local townsfolk.

Inhabitants.Notable Inhabitants:
* [[Aerisi Kalinoth]], the cult's leader and air prophet of the [[Elder Elemental Eye]]
* [[Ahtayir]], the djinni bound to serve Aerisi and her cult
* [[Kaz Hanar]], a skyweaver that protected the temple riding atop a wyvern
* [[Windharrow]], Aerisi's personal minstrel
